IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: HISPANIC SCHOLARSHIP FUND AWARDS SCHOLARSHIPS TO OUTSTANDING HISPANIC STUDENTS IN THE UNITED STATES, PUERTO RICO AND UNITED STATES VIRGIN ISLANDS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE HISPANIC SCHOLARSHIP FUND IS THE NATION'S LEADING HISPANIC SCHOLARSHIP ORGANIZATION, PROVIDING THE HISPANIC COMMUNITY AND OTHER MINORITIES MORE COLLEGE SCHOLARSHIPS AND EDUCATIONAL OUTREACH SUPPORT THAN ANY OTHER ORGANIZATION IN THE COUNTRY. HSF RECOGNIZES AND REWARDS OUTSTANDING HISPANIC STUDENTS IN HIGHER EDUCATION THROUGHOUT THE UNITED STATES, PUERTO RICO AND THE U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS. THESE STUDENTS REPRESENT EVERY REGION OF THE COUNTRY, HUNDREDS OF INSTITUIONS OF HIGHER LEARNING AND EVERY SEGMENT OF THE HISPANIC COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Description: SCHOLARSHIP PROGRAMS- THE FUND ADMINISTERS PROGRAMS FUNDED BY DONATIONS FROM CORPORATIONS, NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS AND INDIVIDUALS. THE FUND ALSO PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIPS THROUGH THE GATES MILLENNIUM SCHOLARS (GMS) PROGRAM IN COLLABORATION WITH THE UNITED NEGRO COLLEGE FUND.

Activity2.Description: OUTREACH PROGRAMS- THE FUND PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL SERVICES TO HISPANICS AND OTHER MINORITY PARENTS AND THEIR CHILDREN FROM K-12. A VARIETY OF BRIEF EVENING TO ALL DAY WEEKEND WORKSHOPS COVER PREPARATION FOR COLLEGE, COLLEGE SELECTION, APPLICATION PROCESS AND APPLYING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND FINANCIAL AID.

Activity3.Description: UNIVERSITY PROGRAMS- THE FUND OFFERS PROGRAMS TO HISPANIC STUDENTS ENROLLED IN COLLEGE. THESE INCLUDE STUDENT GROUPS ON CAMPUS TO INCREASE THE STUDENTS' CONNECTION WITH THEIR COLLEGE CAMPUS AS WELL AS ACADEMIC SUPPORT SERVICES FOR SCHOLARSHIP RECIPIENTS AND THEIR PARENTS.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: Hispanic scholarship fund obtains an enrollment verification form to ensure that the awarded student is enrolled in an accredited school.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A draft of the form 990 was forwarded to the CFO. the cfo had the Form 990 available for the governing board at its most recent meeting, prior to filing.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE POLICY IS IN OUR EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK WHICH EACH EMPLOYEE RECEIVES UPON HIRING. THE POLICY IS EXPLAINED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER UPON JOINING THE BOARD.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HIRED AN OUTSIDE FIRM TO PERFORM RELEVANT RESEARCH. THE DATA WAS PRESENTED TO THE BOARD AND THE BOARD APPROVED ALL OFFICER SALARIES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE IN OUR ANNUAL REPORT.
The organization has a committee that is responsible for oversight of the audit. The process has not changed from the prior year.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: TO ENGAGE the public sector in support of latino higher education.
